Perhaps someone out there knows the answer to this question, or where the=
 answer might be found:  If I were, say, part of the extended family or som=
e low officer of the Imperial Court, what sort of credentials would I carry=
 to prove my legitimacy?  Would it be some sort of signed letter or some ot=
her sort of token?  In other words, what would get me past the guards?

Tha=
nks--

--Richard Burns
